author: Simon Difford
description: The rum character comes through in this tropically fruity cocktail.
name: Passion Fruit Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: Cut passion fruits in half and scoop out flesh into shaker (saving one half for garnish)
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
